eu.wauz.wauzcore.system

Class WauzRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.WauzRegion

  • public class WauzRegion
extends java.lang.Object
    A region, generated from a region config file.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

        public static void init()
        Initializes all master regions and their sub regions.

      • regionCheck

        public static void regionCheck(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if a player region is still valid and determines the new region, if not. Also handles region entering and changes the music, if the region has changed.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose region should be updated.
        See Also:
        getNewRegion(Location), getNewRegion(Location, WauzRegion, boolean), enter(Player), WauzNoteBlockPlayer.play(Player)

      • getNewRegion

        public static WauzRegion getNewRegion(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Finds out the region of a location, if the current region is unknown.
        Parameters:
        location - The location to check.
        Returns:
        The recursively determined region of the location.

      • getNewRegion

        private static WauzRegion getNewRegion(org.bukkit.Location location,
                                       WauzRegion region,
                                       boolean knownToBeInRegion)
        Finds out the region of a location, if the current region is known.
        Parameters:
        location - The location to check.
        region - The current region.
        knownToBeInRegion - If it should not be checked if the current region is still valid.
        Returns:
        The recursively determined region of the location.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        If the location is inside the region.
